mapper.select: SELECT a.no, a.title, a.category_no , a.contents, a.reg_date FROM post a left join category b on a.category_no = b.no WHERE b.blog_id = #{ id } ORDER BY a.no desc limit 1

choose.when: SELECT a.no, a.title, a.contents, a.reg_date, a.category_no FROM post a WHERE a.category_no = #{cno } ORDER BY a.no desc limit 1

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post(title, contents, reg_date, category_no) VALUES (#{title }, #{contents }, now(), #{category_no} )
